hero.title: Logistics solutions for Retail
hero.description: We connect your inventory with every point of sale, channel and end consumer.

intro.text: At Yobel SCM we design and operate integrated logistics chains for retail. We ensure availability, traceability and compliance, optimizing supply to physical stores, marketplaces and end customers.

items.title: Omnichannel Warehousing
items.description: Centralized inventory management by store, channel or marketplace with WMS technology for real-time availability.

items.title: National Distribution
items.description: Store and supermarket supply and direct deliveries to end customer with 24/7 traceability and strict time window compliance.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Labeling, combo assembly, promotional packaging and personalized preparation according to each sales channel requirements.

items.title: E-commerce Fulfillment
items.description: Agile preparation, packaging and dispatch of online orders with direct integration to your digital platform (Shopify, VTEX, Magento, etc.).

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Import management, customs clearance and international transportation of retail merchandise to ensure seasonal stock.

benefits.title: Availability, efficiency and experience
items: Full traceability from distribution center to point of sale.
Reduced lead time in replenishment and online deliveries.
Omnichannel integration with ERP and e-commerce systems.

items.title: Store replenishment
items.fullDesc: Scheduled and optimized deliveries according to each point of sale demand.

items.title: E-commerce fulfillment
items.fullDesc: Fast processing and dispatch of online orders to improve customer experience.

items.title: Campaigns and promotions
items.fullDesc: Kitting, promotional packaging and national distribution for key dates (Cyber, Black Friday).

items.title: Returns management
items.fullDesc: Efficient reverse logistics with quality control and reconditioning for resale.

items.title: Channel integration
items.fullDesc: Unified flow between physical and digital retail for single inventory view.

certificates.description: We operate with international certifications that guarantee quality, safety and sustainability at every stage.
